subject: Re: [junit] Junit exiting the main thread.
msgSnippet: ... The largest chapter of _JUnit Recipes_ discusses testing EJBs (about 75 pages). ... Which finally block are you referring to? Do you have a simple example
messageBody:
madhu_gaut wrote:

> i am very new to JUnit testing, so i am in need of help.
> I would like to know the ways for testing EJB's using JUnit, i have
> already used JUnit framework for normal javaclasses.

The largest chapter of _JUnit Recipes_ discusses testing EJBs (about 75
pages).

> and also to i was
> concerned about the exiting of the process after the testrunner is
> executed without executing the FINALLY block. i would like to know the
> ways to stop it from exiting and perforn the FINALLY taks before end
> of execution.

Which finally block are you referring to? Do you have a simple example
you can post?
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
